source: 随后鹈鹕也让多特罚球，2罚全中。英格伦接著将功赎罪，命中三分球。
target: Subsequently, the Pelicans also let Dortmund take a penalty kick, making both out of two. Then, Ingleton redeemed himself by hitting a three-pointer.

### Idiom: 老而不死
### Meaning: 本是孙子骂旧友原壤年老无德可称术的话，后亦指年老而不利于社会国家或拖累后辈。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 洛枫认为环顾香港及海外的华人地区，他的性别越界与艺术境界，无人能及，其短暂的、一瞬即逝的，成就至美。书末引用作家毛尖追忆哥哥如何影响你我：人活得太久，难免老而不死，歹戏拖棚，唯独张国荣能够从时间中获得赦免，超脱世俗的腐蚀，二十年后更显凄美。文章获授权转载，原文可见于此。
target: Luo Feng believes that looking around Hong Kong and overseas Chinese areas, his gender transgression and artistic realm are unparalleled. His short and fleeting achievements are the most beautiful. At the end of the book, writer Mao Jian is quoted as recalling how his brother influenced you and me: If people live too long, they will inevitably grow old and die, and the evil drama will drag on. Only Leslie Cheung can be forgiven by time, transcending the corrosion of the world, and it will become even more poignant twenty years later. . The article is reprinted with permission and the original text can be found here.

context:
### Idiom: 石破天惊
### Meaning: 唐李贺《李凭箜篌引》：“女娲炼石补天处，石破天惊逗秋雨。”形容乐声高亢激越，有惊天动地之势。后多用以比喻某一事物或文章议论新奇惊人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 伦理担忧对ChatGPT也同样存在——它已展现出‘石破天惊’的智慧化一面，对很多领域产生破坏性，比较直接的例子是有大学生用其生成论文并获得高分。不仅如此，生成式人工智慧进化速度极快，ChatGPT去（2022）年11月推出后，今年3月迭代出的GPT-4，不仅知识面更广、对答更流畅，开始能够读懂图片内容，在律师资格考试中拿下高分，而且具备自我反思的能力。
target: Also, ChatGPT has demonstrated a "surprisingly intelligent" side, which has been controversial in many fields, the most direct example of which is a student who used it to produce a paper and received a high grade. Not only that, generated AI has evolved very fast, ChatGPT was launched in November 2022, and the GPT-4, which has been updated in March of this year, has a wider knowledge base, a smoother conversation, has begun to read content, has a high rating in the lawyer's exam, and has the ability to self-reflect.

### Idiom: 大喜过望
### Meaning: 谓结果比原来希望的更好，因而感到特别高兴。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 本片还获颁第70届金球奖最佳动画片、第66届英国电影学院奖最佳动画片、第85届奥斯卡金像奖最佳动画片奖等奖项。《勇敢传说》这部动作冒险电影的主要场景是中世纪的苏格兰高地，讲述的联盟邓布罗赫家族的故事：当地的联盟国王佛格与艾琳诺皇后育有一名独生女梅莉达，梅莉达有著醒目的橘红色蓬松卷发，个性外向急躁，她在六岁生日时获得父亲赠送一组弓箭而大喜过望，开始勤练弓箭技巧，期许未来成为能够被众人称为一个很厉害的弓箭手，然而这与她母亲艾琳诺皇后希望女儿成为举止端庄的公主并早日出嫁的愿望相背，也使得梅莉达与母亲经常因想法不同而发生争执。某天梅莉达在树林冒险取箭期间，不巧遇见了一缕幽火，稍后一头巨大的恶魔黑熊莫杜袭击了这家人，梅莉达与艾琳诺连忙骑乘马匹逃走，佛格则和手下联合抵挡黑熊的攻势，此次事件也造成佛格永久失去一条腿。
target: This film also won the 70th Golden Globe Award for Best Animated Film, the 66th British Academy Film Award for Best Animated Film, the 85th Academy Award for Best Animated Film, and other awards. "Brave" is an action-adventure film set in the medieval Scottish Highlands, telling the story of the DunBroch family: The local King Fergus and Queen Elinor have an only daughter, Merida, who has striking orange, curly hair and an outgoing and impulsive personality. On her sixth birthday, she was overjoyed to receive a set of bows and arrows from her father, and began to practice archery skills, hoping to be recognized as a great archer in the future. However, this is contrary to her mother Queen Elinor's wish for her daughter to be a dignified princess and marry early, which often leads to disputes between Merida and her mother. One day, while Merida was adventuring in the forest to retrieve her arrows, she unfortunately encountered a will-o'-the-wisp, and shortly after, a giant demon black bear named Mor'du attacked the family. Merida and Elinor quickly rode away on horseback, while Fergus and his men resisted the bear's attack. This incident also resulted in Fergus permanently losing a leg.

### Idiom: 富贵不能淫
### Meaning: 富贵旧指有钱财、有地位；淫迷惑。指意志不为金钱和地位所迷惑。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 严肃稳妥处置不合格党员，保持党员队伍先进性和纯洁性。坚持党性党风党纪一起抓，从思想上固本培元，提高党性觉悟，增强拒腐防变能力，涵养富贵不能淫、贫贱不能移、威武不能屈的浩然正气。党风问题关系执政党的生死存亡。
target: Serious and prudent handling of unqualified party members, maintaining the advanced nature and purity of the party member team. We should adhere to the comprehensive handling of party spirit, style, and discipline, from the perspective of ideology, consolidate the foundation, improve the awareness of party spirit, enhance the ability to resist corruption and change, and cultivate the majesty and dignity of the party. Party style problems are related to the survival and death of the ruling party.

target: Aquarius: Good people are rewarded, and being enthusiastic about helping others helps gain good popularity. Pisces: There is no need to compare with others, it is no different from asking for trouble.

### Idiom: 日月交食
### Meaning: 指日蚀和月蚀；比喻彼此争斗，做了冤家对头。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 生子二长子尧宣、次子尧德。执羔公宋宣和甲辰（1124）年登宏晦榜进士，廷诚御擢第二，累官礼部尚书，龙图阁大学士，赠太子太师从一品，南宋天文学家，推日月交食，考五纬盈缩，以纪气朔寒暑之候。撰《历仪》、《历书》、《五星测验》各一卷。
target: The second son was Yao Xuan, and the younger son was Yao De. In the year of Jia Chen (1124), he passed the imperial examination and ranked second in the court. He held various positions such as Minister of Rites, Grand Academician of the Dragon Pavilion, and was conferred the title of Grand Tutor to the Crown Prince, a first-rank official. He was an astronomer in the Southern Song Dynasty, predicting solar and lunar eclipses, studying the expansion and contraction of the five latitudes, and recording the changes of seasons. He wrote "Calendar Instruments", "Calendar Book", and "Five Star Tests", each in one volume.

### Idiom: 敲榨勒索
### Meaning: 依仗势力或抓籽柄进行恐吓，用威胁手段索取财物。同敲诈勒索”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 乾隆帝命令各省宫府捉拿教徒。武昌有个官员向百姓敲榨勒索不成，罗织罪状，受到株连的有几千人。有钱的出钱买命，没钱的穷人就被抓到监狱里拷打，甚至送了命。
target: The Qing dynasty ordered the provincial palaces to arrest the clergy. A clergyman in Wuhan tried to steal from the people but failed, a hundreds of people were implicated. The rich could buy the lives of the poor, the poor could be taken to jail and tortured, sometimes given away.

context:
### Idiom: 邪不压正
### Meaning: 不正当的、不正派的压不倒正当的、正派的事物。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 生性良善、立志成为一代侠女的叶兮初入江湖，对武林和爱情抱有美好的幻想，一意锄强扶弱，却不懂人心险恶，竟一再遭遇利用、欺骗和背叛，甚至于被自己信任的“大侠”、以为可以相携仗剑天下的“良人”出卖，名声尽毁且几度被害。但纵然遭遇重重打击，叶兮仍然初心不改，坚信邪不压正、公道自在人心，她努力追查真相，证明自己的清白。期间，被枫华谷谷主神医白岳多次相救，一陆默默守护、生死与共，在白岳的帮助下，叶兮铲除了武林败类，成长为真正的武林侠女，白岳也用医术救治了被蛊惑的武林众人，两人携手弘扬武林正气，彼此收获了真爱。
target: Born with kindness and determined to become a generation of female knights, Ye Xi entered the江湖 with beautiful fantasies about the world of martial arts and love. She was determined to锄强扶弱, but she didn't understand the wickedness of human nature and kept encountering manipulation, deception, and betrayal. Even her so-called "great knight" and "good man" whom she trusted sold her out, destroying her reputation and causing her harm multiple times. However, despite the numerous setbacks, Ye Xi remained steadfast in her beliefs,坚信邪不压正、公道自在人心, and she worked hard to uncover the truth and prove her innocence. During this time, she was repeatedly rescued by the Valley Master of Maple Valley, the skilled physician Bai Yue, and one Liu默默守护、生死与共. With Bai Yue's help, Ye Xi eliminated the martial arts scoundrels and grew into a true martial arts knight. Bai Yue also used his medical skills to save the corrupted martial artists, and together they promoted justice in the martial arts world, ultimately finding true love in each other.

### Idiom: 青天霹雳
### Meaning: 霹雳响雷。晴天打响雷。比喻突然发生意外的，令人震惊的事件。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 一天，姜铲和是姴进入二花院，那里只有柳嘏和陆浩，变得很吵。一屋三高！正当我以为春风轻拂二花院和达诺的心时，青天霹雳落下。他让我交出二花院，因为我欠我已故的父亲。
target: One day, Jiang Chan and Shi Pan entered the Erhua Courtyard, where only Liu Gu and Lu Hao were present, making it very noisy. Three highs in one room! Just when I thought the spring breeze was gently brushing the Erhua Courtyard and Da Nuo's heart, a thunderbolt fell from the clear sky. He asked me to hand over the Erhua Courtyard, because I owed it to my late father.

### Idiom: 清灰冷火
### Meaning: 没吃没喝。常用以形容贫困冷清的景象。同清灰冷灶”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: 此去一别岁月多， 如何凭说， 莫，漠，陌。山遥海阔，隐隐绅绅， 清灰冷火又添几箩。愁坐，花下酌，与谁说.
target: This gone for so long, how can I say, '莫, 漠, 陌?' Mountains and seas, hidden and veiled, and a few gray smoke and cold fire.

context:
### Idiom: 救人一命，胜造七级浮屠
### Meaning: 指救人性命功德无量。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 热恋开始，我真的不想离开她，但是马海波却不断催我，说吴刚的病情耽误不得，要能去，尽快去一趟吧，救人一命，胜造七级浮屠呢？是不是，像你们这个行当的，不就是讲究一个善有善报、恶有恶报么？我被这个马唐僧给唠叨得实在受不了了，于是回了趟家，简单收拾了行李，准备于正月十三乘飞机，离开晋平。
target: I was in love, I really didn't want to leave her, but Ma Haibo kept urging me to hurry, telling me that a life saved is better than building a seven-stage pyramid? Isn't it true, like your profession, it's just a matter of a good and a bad, right? I was annoyed by this Ma Taoist, so I went home, simply packed my bags, ready to fly to Japan on the lunar new year.

context:
### Idiom: 不知就里
### Meaning: 不了解内情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 在体力、时间及Budget均相当有限的情况下，Arthur与行仔的8天行程依然丰富，玩匀海陆空之余，更在制作组安排下，卖港式鸡蛋仔赚盘川，行仔全程豁出去大声叫卖，Arthur则贯彻‘迷男郎’本色迷失到底。今明播放的头两集，出发时喜气洋洋的Arthur和行仔，甫落机即被制作组强行‘开始拍摄’，完全不知就里的二人，在没有剧本及任何资讯的情况下，开始了为期8天的‘丧行’之旅。2人首个任务挑战‘豪华海景野餐’，单是寻找合适景点及食物已行到脚酸，其间更遇上猴子小偷将2人辛苦得来的驰名鸭肉‘毁掉’，令他们要‘返回起点重新出发’。
target: Despite limited physical strength, time, and budget, Arthur and Xing Zai's 8-day trip was still rich and varied. They enjoyed land, sea, and air activities, and under the arrangement of the production team, they even sold Hong Kong-style egg waffles to earn money. Xing Zai was all out, shouting loudly for sales, while Arthur embodied the 'lost man' character and got totally lost. The first two episodes to be broadcast today and tomorrow show Arthur and Xing Zai, who were cheerful at the start, being forced to 'start filming' by the production team as soon as they landed. The two, who were completely clueless, began their 8-day 'travelogue' journey without a script or any information. Their first task was to challenge a 'luxurious sea view picnic', just looking for a suitable spot and food was exhausting. During the process, they even encountered monkey thieves who 'ruined' the famous duck meat they had worked hard to get, forcing them to 'go back to the starting point and start over'.

target: Out of the twenty remaining men, five were killed, fifteen left, all with broken heads and broken hearts, rushing back.

context:
### Idiom: 救人一命，胜造七级浮屠
### Meaning: 指救人性命功德无量。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 热恋开始，我真的不想离开她，但是马海波却不断催我，说吴刚的病情耽误不得，要能去，尽快去一趟吧，救人一命，胜造七级浮屠呢？是不是，像你们这个行当的，不就是讲究一个善有善报、恶有恶报么？我被这个马唐僧给唠叨得实在受不了了，于是回了趟家，简单收拾了行李，准备于正月十三乘飞机，离开晋平。
target: The passionate romance had just begun and I really didn't want to leave her. However, Ma Haibo kept urging me, saying that Wu Gang's condition couldn't be delayed. He suggested that if possible, I should go as soon as possible. Saving a life is better than building a seven-story pagoda, right? Isn't it true that in your line of work, you believe in the principle of good deeds being rewarded and evil deeds being punished? I was really fed up with Ma Tangseng's nagging, so I went home, packed my bags simply, and prepared to take a flight on the thirteenth of the lunar month, leaving Jinping.

### Meaning: 拿功劳补偿过失。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 杜兰特最后1分24秒飙进三分球，把比数追成106比109，接著保罗两罚俱中，双方只差1分，接下来快艇连攻3波都没进球，却让韦斯布鲁克最后17.7秒两罚俱中，韦斯布鲁克接著更赏戴文布克火锅，更把球砸到布克脚上出界，太阳只好送艾瑞克戈登最后7.9秒两罚俱中，也让胜负底定。韦斯布鲁克虽然全场投19中3，只拿9分、8助攻与10篮板，却在最后关头靠著罚球与火锅将功赎罪，艾瑞克戈登19分，鲍威尔14分，祖巴兹12分、15篮板；杜兰特拿下26分、11助攻与9篮板的准大三元，戴文布克也拿26分，可惜两人仍然无法挽回场上颓势。
target: Durant scored a three-pointer in the last 1 minute and 24 seconds, narrowing the score to 106-109. Then, Paul made both free throws, bringing the difference to just one point. However, the Clippers failed to score in three consecutive attacks, allowing Westbrook to make both free throws in the last 17.7 seconds. Westbrook then blocked a shot by Devin Booker and even knocked the ball out of bounds off Booker's foot. The Suns had no choice but to let Eric Gordon make both free throws in the last 7.9 seconds, which determined the outcome of the game. Despite only scoring 9 points, 8 assists and 10 rebounds from 19 shots, Westbrook redeemed himself with his free throws and blocks at the crucial moment. Eric Gordon scored 19 points, Powell 14 points, and Zubac 12 points and 15 rebounds. Durant achieved a near triple-double with 26 points, 11 assists and 9 rebounds. Booker also scored 26 points, but unfortunately, they were still unable to reverse the situation on the court.

### Idiom: 江山易改，本性难移
### Meaning: 人的本性的改变，比江山的变迁还要难。形容人的本性难以改变。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 江山易改，本性难移，成年之后一个人的品格基本形成，如果在婚前的选择上仔细辨别，一定程度上能远离渣男。
target: The world is in a constant state of change, but a person’s character is difficult to change. After reaching adulthood, a person’s character is basically formed. If you carefully choose your partner before marriage, you can avoid some scum men.

context:
### Idiom: 艰深晦涩
### Meaning: 艰深文辞深奥难懂；晦涩意义隐晦，不顺口。形容笔调深僻、寓意难以理解的文章。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 所谓禁欲主义不过是要求人们无条件地忍受专制压迫的枷锁罢了。霍尔巴赫指出:“使人成为善良的，是有理性的教育、高尚的习惯、贤明的体系，公正的法律和赏罚得当；而不是种种艰深晦涩的思辨。
target: The so-called asceticism is nothing more than asking people to unconditionally endure the yoke of authoritarian oppression. Holbach pointed out: “What makes people good is rational education, noble habits, a wise system, just laws and appropriate rewards and punishments; rather than all kinds of difficult and obscure speculations.

context:
### Idiom: 天无绝人之路
### Meaning: 天下不会断绝人的出路，把人困死。比喻人虽一时处于绝境，但终归可以找到出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: （取材自苹果官网）隔天他收到‘Find My’App通知，得知自己的Apple Watch已被开启，他也在该手表上启用‘遗失模式’并输入个人资讯，试图让拾获者可以连络他，没想到天无绝人之路，一名50岁的潜水员托16岁的女儿在Instagram对他发送讯息，表示他们在海上找到了Apple Watch，并试图为它充电，发现还能正常使用，透过‘遗失模式’找到男子连络资讯，最后他真的幸运拿回了Apple Watch他表示，不仅惊讶泡过海水的Apple Watch还能使用，人们协助找回东西并归还的热心与诚实，更让他感动不已。
target: (Sourced from Apple's official website) The day after, he received a notification from the 'Find My' App, informing him that his Apple Watch had been turned on. He also activated the 'Lost Mode' on the watch and entered his personal information, hoping that the finder could contact him. Unexpectedly, a 50-year-old diver, through his 16-year-old daughter, sent him a message on Instagram, stating that they had found the Apple Watch at sea, and tried to charge it, discovering that it was still functioning normally. Through the 'Lost Mode', they were able to find the man's contact information, and in the end, he was fortunate to get his Apple Watch back. He expressed that he was not only surprised that the Apple Watch, which had been soaked in seawater, could still be used, but also deeply moved by the warmth and honesty of the people who helped to find and return his belongings.

### Idiom: 灭绝人性
### Meaning: 完全丧失人所具有的理性。形容极端残忍，象野兽一样。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 日军受到天皇政府的支持，对南京进行了长达六周的屠城烧，杀，抢，掠，奸，日军灭绝人性的屠城，使南京瞬间变成了人间地狱，南京城内血流成河，尸积如山，30万中国同胞被杀害，30万冤魂笼罩在南京城的上空，他们在控诉，控诉这惨绝人寰的暴行，控诉这惨无人道的侵略。
target: The Japanese army, supported by the Imperial Government, conducted a six-week massacre, burning, looting, raping, and killing in Nanjing, turning the city into a living hell in an instant. Blood flowed like rivers and corpses piled up like mountains within the city walls. 300,000 Chinese compatriots were killed, and 300,000冤魂冤魂 hovered above the city of Nanjing, accusing and accusing this inhuman atrocity and this inhumane invasion.

### Idiom: 老奸巨猾
### Meaning: 指阅历很深，老于世故，而手段又极其奸诈狡猾者。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 费利一见记者，就大夸俄罗斯这次冬奥会的组织工作出色，运营能力高强。“老奸巨猾”的费利马上意识到“越位”了，立刻予以回应：“首先，我必须声明，关于国际奥委会最终对索契的评价以巴赫主席在闭幕式上说的为准。”费利介绍，国际奥委会特地广泛征询了运动员的意见，反馈的意见是评价很好，运动员们对住宿、饮食、场馆、比赛和氛围都交口称赞，尤其是俄罗斯观众不只为主队加油，也为其他客队鼓掌。
target: When Fei saw the reporters, he praised the organization work of the Winter Olympics in Russia this time. He also said that Russia’s operation ability was very strong. "I immediately realized that I had "overstepped" my bounds. Fei said, "First of all, I must state that the final evaluation of the Sochi Winter Olympics by the International Olympic Committee is as stated by Bach, president of the International Olympic Committee. " Fei introduced that the International Olympic Committee had asked athletes to give their opinions on the evaluation of the Sochi Winter Olympics. The athletes praised the accommodation, food, facilities, competitions and atmosphere. In particular, Russian audiences did not only cheer for the home team, but also cheered for other guest teams.

### Idiom: 运筹帷幄
### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 萧赫麟（1968年7月1日—），原名萧炳贤中华民国无党籍政治人物。萧赫麟还有个别名“齐原”他在演艺圈当过制作人、办活动，也曾在商界当过运筹帷幄的咨商顾问，工作经历丰富，尽管是政治素人，但他长年为弱势奔走，博得“陈情达人”称号，也因为长期协助弱势解决问题，才发现基层民众的困境，而台湾政治依然陷入两大党的污泥恶斗心机算计，台湾民众何时出头天？记者蓝振睿/综合报导。生于南投县，曾为新政世纪党、国会政党联盟、民主进步党党员，并曾被无党联盟、健保免费连线、人民最大党等政党提名，参与过第十届台北市议员选举、第八届立法委员选举、第二届新北市议员选举、第十三届台北市议员选举、第十届立法委员补选，惟目前未有当选之纪录。
target: Xiao He-lin (July 1, 1968-), originally named Xiao Bing-xian, is an independent politician in the Republic of China. Xiao He-lin is also known by the alias "Qi Yuan". He has worked as a producer and event organizer in the entertainment industry, and has also worked as a consulting advisor in the business world with a wealth of work experience. Although he is a political novice, he has long been advocating for the disadvantaged and has earned the nickname "Complaint Expert". He has also discovered the difficulties faced by grassroots people through his long-term assistance in solving problems for the disadvantaged. However, Taiwan's politics are still mired in the mudslinging and scheming of the two major parties, when will Taiwan's people see the light of day? Reporter Lan Zhen-rui/ Combined report. He was born in Nantou County and was a member of the New Era Century Party, the Congressional Party Alliance, and the Democratic Progressive Party. He has also been nominated by the Nonpartisan Alliance, the Health Insurance Free Call, and the People's最大党, among others, and has participated in the 10th Taipei City Council election, the 8th Legislative Yuan election, the 2nd New Taipei City Council election, the 13th Taipei City Council election, and the 10th Legislative Yuan by-election. However, he currently has no record of winning.

### Idiom: 困兽犹斗
### Meaning: 被围困的野兽仍然搏斗。比喻处于绝境仍作竭力挣扎。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 封敕文预先设置重兵在壕沟外拦击，战斗从夜里一直打到次日早晨。封敕文与众将士商议说：“困兽犹斗，何况是人。叛军知道他们没有生路，同我们拼死对抗，一定会伤害我们的将士，我们不容易平定他们。
target: Peng Cheng Wen set up a stronghold outside the ditch in advance and fought until the next morning. Peng Cheng Wen discussed with the soldiers that said: "The trapped beast will fight, how much more is the human. The rebels know that they have no way out, so they will fight with us, and they will hurt our soldiers. We can't easily pacify them.
